amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-815 to require the Director of National Intelligence to report on the possible exploitation of virtual currencies by terrorist actors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Miss Rice (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
